original_text: So I confronted the officials and said, “Why is the house of God forsaken?” And I gathered them together and set them in their stations.
korean_text: 내가 모든 민장들을 꾸짖어 이르기를 하나님의 전이 어찌하여 버린 바 되었느냐 하고 곧 레위 사람을 불러 모아 다시 제자리에 세웠더니

sentences.original_text: So I confronted the officials and said,
Why is the house of God forsaken?
and set them in their stations.
